title: Lesson 60
paragraph: Urban planning and sustainability balance growth with efficiency. Generating solutions, converting resources, and dramatizing awareness support sustainable cities.

words.example: She vence all obstacles to succeed.
He redeemed himself with excellent work.
The village was electricityless for hours.
Students must focus on their studies.
